ack.p: We would like to thank the National Institute of Animal Health, Japan and Fukuoka Chuo Livestock Hygiene Service Center, Fukuoka, Japan for providing PEDV strains and Vero cells.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI (Grant Number 15Â K18786) and the Ito Foundation. The funders had no role in study design, or the collection, analysis, and interpretation of data. In addition, they were not involved in the writing of the report or the decision to submit the article for publication.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets supporting the conclusions of this article are included within the article. All datasets are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
